$x,y,z$ sont des fonctions de $t$. Résoudre les systèmes :
value.html: \(x,y,z\) sont des fonctions de \(t\). Résoudre les systèmes :
\(\begin{cases} x' = 2y + 2z\cr y' = -x + 2y + 2z\cr z' = -x + y + 3z.\cr\end{cases}\)

value.latex:
$x = 2\alpha e^t + (2\gamma t + 2\beta-\gamma) e^{2t}$, \quad
             $y = (\gamma t + \beta) e^{2t}$, \quad
             $z = \alpha e^t + (\gamma t + \beta) e^{2t}$.
value.html: \(x = 2\alpha e^t + (2\gamma t + 2\beta-\gamma) e^{2t}\), \(y = (\gamma t + \beta) e^{2t}\), \(z = \alpha e^t + (\gamma t + \beta) e^{2t}\).
\(\begin{cases} y'+y = z \cr z'+2z = y-1. \cr\end{cases}\)

value.latex:
$y = -1 + \lambda e^{\alpha t} + \mu e^{\beta t}$,\quad
             $z = -1 + \lambda(1+\alpha) e^{\alpha t} + \mu(1+\beta) e^{\beta t}$,\quad
             $\alpha = \frac{-3+\sqrt5}2$,
             $\beta  = \frac{-3-\sqrt5}2$.
value.html: \(y = -1 + \lambda e^{\alpha t} + \mu e^{\beta t}\), \(z = -1 + \lambda(1+\alpha) e^{\alpha t} + \mu(1+\beta) e^{\beta t}\), \(\alpha = \frac{-3+\sqrt5}2\), \(\beta = \frac{-3-\sqrt5}2\).
\(\begin{cases} y' = y+z+ \sin t\cr z'=-y+3z.\cr\end{cases}\)
\(y = \frac{-3\cos t-13\sin t}{25} + (at+b)e^{2t}\), \(z = \frac{-4\cos t- 3\sin t}{25} + (at+a+b)e^{2t}\).
\(x = (a+bt+ct^2)e^t\), \(y = \left({a+\frac{b-c}2 + (b+c)t+ct^2}\right)e^t\), \(z = \left({a-\frac{b+c}2 + (b-c)t+ct^2}\right)e^t\).

value.latex:
$\begin{cases} x' = 2x + y + z   \cr
             y' = x - y - z    \cr
             z' = -x + 2y + 2z.\cr\end{cases}$
value.html: \(\begin{cases} x' = 2x + y + z \cr y' = x - y - z \cr z' = -x + 2y + 2z.\cr\end{cases}\)

\(x = -(b+c)e^t + (a+b+c)e^{2t}\),

\(y = \frac12(-a+5b+3c) - 2(b+c)e^t + \frac12(a+b+c)e^{2t}\),

\(z = \frac12(a-5b-3c) + 3(b+c)e^t - \frac12(a+b+c)e^{2t}\).

value.latex:
$\begin{cases} x' = 2x + z + \sh t\cr
             y' = x - y - z + \ch t\cr
             z' = -x + 2y + 2z - \ch t.\cr\end{cases}$
value.html: \(\begin{cases} x' = 2x + z + \sh t\cr y' = x - y - z + \ch t\cr z' = -x + 2y + 2z - \ch t.\cr\end{cases}\)

\(x = (at^2 + (a+b+\frac12)t + a+b+c)e^t\),

\(y = (at^2 + (b-a+\frac12)t + a+c)e^t - \frac12e^{-t}\),

\(z = (-at^2 + (a-b-\frac12)t -c)e^t + \frac12e^{-t}\).
